Name: Murder by Moonlight - Call of the Wolf
About the game: Play a thrilling Match3 game with a suspenseful crime story. Carol has just gotten married and is looking forward to a wonderful life together with her husband, Jake. One day, however, Jake disappears while at the local gas station. Following his trail, Carol has reason to suspect foul play. When the police refuse to investigate, she has no choice but to take matters into her own hands... and as she searches for her missing husband, she begins to uncover evidence of a dark mystery involving a beast that can’t possibly exist. Game Features - A dark mystery about a woman’s search for her missing husband, told across five chapters. - Supernatural elements blend together with this crime story as rumors suggest a werewolf is on the loose. - Test your skills with exciting match-3 puzzles and hidden object games. - Find clues, search for evidence, and talk to witnesses as you unlock new upgrades to reveal the truth.
